mapper.select: SELECT spon_no, spon_name, spon_total, FORMAT(spon_total, 0) AS spon_total_string, spon_iscampaign, spon_start, spon_end, spon_url, spon_comment, spon_img, spon_img_size FROM spon where spon_no = #{spon_no}
INSERT INTO spon (spon_total) VALUES(#{spon_total}) where spon_no = #{spon_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE spon_com SET spon_com_content=#{spon_com_content} where spon_com_no=#{spon_com_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_cashlog (user_no, user_cashlog_log, user_cashlog_price, user_cashlog_date) VALUES(#{user_no},#{user_cashlog_log},'-${user_cashlog_price}',sysdate())
mapper.update: UPDATE user a SET user_cash=((SELECT user_cash from (SELECT user_cash as c from user WHERE user_no = #{user_no}) d)-(#{user_cash})) WHERE user_no = #{user_no}
UPDATE spon a SET spon_total=((SELECT spon_total from (SELECT spon_total as c from spon WHERE spon_no = #{spon_no}) d)+(#{spon_total})) WHERE spon_no = #{spon_no}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM spon_com WHERE spon_no=#{spon_no}
